title: Ceremony 4:30 PM
alt: Interlocked rings for the wedding ceremony
text: The ceremony will begin promptly at 4:30 PM in the front courtyard of the Golden Gate Club. Don't be late!

title: Cocktails 5:00 PM
alt: Champagne glasses toasting for cocktail hour
text: Cocktail hour will follow the ceremony, both outside in the front courtyard and in the adjacent Hawthorn Room.

title: Reception 6:00 PM
alt: Crossed fork and knife for the dinner and reception
text: Dinner will be served at about 6:00 PM in the Ventana Room, with dancing, drinks, and fun to follow!
